title: Unintuitive error message when incorrectly specifying `--set` flag

labels.name: bug

EKS

## Issue
After upgrading to Helm v3 I specified the `--set` flag still in the old manner, which lead to an error that did not point to the issue: `Error: must provide a name or specify --generate-name`. It would be nice if this could actually point to the invalid flag. See also the attached screenshot.
![Incorrect set flag specification](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26072918/70808937-16678c80-1dc1-11ea-8f9b-5be66002c64f.png)
